{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated \$8.3M in 2020-2021 on contracts with NUNA EAST.
{{< /entity_summary >}}

{{< details summary="See original contracts and amendments" panel_body_class="vendor-names-list" >}}
- [Nuna East Ltd.](https://search.open.canada.ca/en/ct/?sort=contract_value_f%20desc&page=1&search_text=%22Nuna%20East%20Ltd.%22)
- [NUNA EAST LTD.](https://search.open.canada.ca/en/ct/?sort=contract_value_f%20desc&page=1&search_text=%22NUNA%20EAST%20LTD.%22)
- [NUNA East Ltd.](https://search.open.canada.ca/en/ct/?sort=contract_value_f%20desc&page=1&search_text=%22NUNA%20East%20Ltd.%22)
{{< /details >}}
